verses.kjv: Moreover thou shalt make the tabernacle with ten curtains of fine twined linen, and blue, and purple, and scarlet: with cherubims of cunning work shalt thou make them.
verses.web: “Moreover you shall make the tabernacle with ten curtains of fine twined linen, and blue, and purple, and scarlet, with cherubim. You shall make them with the work of a skillful workman.
verses.ct: "Build the tabernacle using 10 curtains made from finely woven linen in blue, purple, and scarlet, with images of cherubim skillfully worked into the fabric.

verses.kjv: The length of one curtain shall be eight and twenty cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: and every one of the curtains shall have one measure.
verses.web: The length of each curtain shall be twenty-eight cubits, and the width of each curtain four cubits: all the curtains shall have one measure.
verses.ct: Each curtain must be 28 cubits long and 4 cubits wide — all 10 curtains the same size.

verses.kjv: The five curtains shall be coupled together one to another; and other five curtains shall be coupled one to another.
verses.web: Five curtains shall be coupled together to one another, and the other five curtains shall be coupled to one another.
verses.ct: Join 5 of the curtains together into one set, and join the other 5 into a second set.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make loops of blue upon the edge of the one curtain from the selvedge in the coupling; and likewise shalt thou make in the uttermost edge of another curtain, in the coupling of the second.
verses.web: You shall make loops of blue on the edge of the one curtain from the edge in the coupling, and you shall do likewise on the edge of the curtain that is outermost in the second coupling.
verses.ct: Attach loops of blue fabric along the outer edge of the last curtain in the first set, and do the same along the outer edge of the last curtain in the second set.

verses.kjv: Fifty loops shalt thou make in the one curtain, and fifty loops shalt thou make in the edge of the curtain that is in the coupling of the second; that the loops may take hold one of another.
verses.web: You shall make fifty loops in the one curtain, and you shall make fifty loops in the edge of the curtain that is in the second coupling. The loops shall be opposite one another.
verses.ct: Put 50 loops on the edge of the first set and 50 loops on the edge of the second set, positioned so the loops line up directly across from each other.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make fifty taches of gold, and couple the curtains together with the taches: and it shall be one tabernacle.
verses.web: You shall make fifty clasps of gold, and couple the curtains to one another with the clasps. The tabernacle shall be a unit.
verses.ct: Then make 50 gold clasps and use them to fasten the two sets of curtains together, so the tabernacle forms one unified structure.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make curtains of goats’ hair to be a covering upon the tabernacle: eleven curtains shalt thou make.
verses.web: “You shall make curtains of goats’ hair for a covering over the tabernacle. You shall make eleven curtains.
verses.ct: "Next, make a covering for the tabernacle out of goat hair curtains — 11 curtains in all.

verses.kjv: The length of one curtain shall be thirty cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: and the eleven curtains shall be all of one measure.
verses.web: The length of each curtain shall be thirty cubits, and the width of each curtain four cubits: the eleven curtains shall have one measure.
verses.ct: Each curtain must be 30 cubits long and 4 cubits wide — all 11 curtains the same size.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt couple five curtains by themselves, and six curtains by themselves, and shalt double the sixth curtain in the forefront of the tabernacle.
verses.web: You shall couple five curtains by themselves, and six curtains by themselves, and shall double over the sixth curtain in the forefront of the tent.
verses.ct: Join 5 of these curtains into one set and 6 into another set. Fold the 6th curtain double at the front of the tent.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make fifty loops on the edge of the one curtain that is outmost in the coupling, and fifty loops in the edge of the curtain which coupleth the second.
verses.web: You shall make fifty loops on the edge of the one curtain that is outermost in the coupling, and fifty loops on the edge of the curtain which is outermost in the second coupling.
verses.ct: Attach 50 loops along the outer edge of the last curtain in the first set, and 50 loops along the outer edge of the last curtain in the second set.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make fifty taches of brass, and put the taches into the loops, and couple the tent together, that it may be one.
verses.web: You shall make fifty clasps of bronze, and put the clasps into the loops, and couple the tent together, that it may be one.
verses.ct: Make 50 bronze clasps, insert them into the loops, and fasten the tent covering together so it becomes one piece.

verses.kjv: And the remnant that remaineth of the curtains of the tent, the half curtain that remaineth, shall hang over the backside of the tabernacle.
verses.web: The overhanging part that remains of the curtains of the tent—the half curtain that remains—shall hang over the back of the tabernacle.
verses.ct: The extra half-curtain that remains from this covering should hang down over the back of the tabernacle.

verses.kjv: And a cubit on the one side, and a cubit on the other side of that which remaineth in the length of the curtains of the tent, it shall hang over the sides of the tabernacle on this side and on that side, to cover it.
verses.web: The cubit on the one side and the cubit on the other side, of that which remains in the length of the curtains of the tent, shall hang over the sides of the tabernacle on this side and on that side, to cover it.
verses.ct: The extra cubit of length on each side of the goat hair curtains should drape over both sides of the tabernacle to cover it.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make a covering for the tent of rams’ skins dyed red, and a covering above of badgers’ skins.
verses.web: You shall make a covering for the tent of rams’ skins dyed red, and a covering of sea cow hides above.
verses.ct: Over the goat hair covering, place a layer of ram skins dyed red, and over that, a top layer of fine leather.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make boards for the tabernacle of shittim wood standing up.
verses.web: “You shall make the boards for the tabernacle of acacia wood, standing upright.
verses.ct: "Build the framework for the tabernacle using upright boards of acacia wood.

verses.kjv: Ten cubits shall be the length of a board, and a cubit and a half shall be the breadth of one board.
verses.web: Ten cubits shall be the length of a board, and one and a half cubits the width of each board.
verses.ct: Each board must be 10 cubits tall and 1 and a half cubits wide.

verses.kjv: Two tenons shall there be in one board, set in order one against another: thus shalt thou make for all the boards of the tabernacle.
verses.web: There shall be two tenons in each board, joined to one another: thus you shall make for all the boards of the tabernacle.
verses.ct: Each board must have 2 tenons that fit together side by side. Make every board for the tabernacle this way.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make the boards for the tabernacle, twenty boards on the south side southward.
verses.web: You shall make twenty boards for the tabernacle, for the south side southward.
verses.ct: For the south side of the tabernacle, make 20 boards.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make forty sockets of silver under the twenty boards; two sockets under one board for his two tenons, and two sockets under another board for his two tenons.
verses.web: You shall make forty sockets of silver under the twenty boards; two sockets under one board for its two tenons, and two sockets under another board for its two tenons.
verses.ct: Place 40 silver bases under the 20 boards — 2 bases under each board, one for each tenon.

verses.kjv: And for the second side of the tabernacle on the north side there shall be twenty boards:
verses.web: For the second side of the tabernacle, on the north side, twenty boards,
verses.ct: For the north side of the tabernacle, make another 20 boards,

verses.kjv: And their forty sockets of silver; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board.
verses.web: and their forty sockets of silver; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board.
verses.ct: along with their 40 silver bases — 2 bases under each board.

verses.kjv: And for the sides of the tabernacle westward thou shalt make six boards.
verses.web: For the far side of the tabernacle westward you shall make six boards.
verses.ct: For the west end of the tabernacle, make 6 boards.

verses.kjv: And two boards shalt thou make for the corners of the tabernacle in the two sides.
verses.web: You shall make two boards for the corners of the tabernacle in the far side.
verses.ct: Also make 2 additional boards for the 2 back corners of the tabernacle.

verses.kjv: And they shall be coupled together beneath, and they shall be coupled together above the head of it unto one ring: thus shall it be for them both; they shall be for the two corners.
verses.web: They shall be double beneath, and in the same way they shall be whole to its top to one ring: thus shall it be for them both; they shall be for the two corners.
verses.ct: These corner boards must be joined together from bottom to top, connected at the top by a single ring. Both corner boards should be built this way.

verses.kjv: And they shall be eight boards, and their sockets of silver, sixteen sockets; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board.
verses.web: There shall be eight boards, and their sockets of silver, sixteen sockets; two sockets under one board, and two sockets under another board.
verses.ct: So the west end will have 8 boards total, set in 16 silver bases — 2 bases under each board.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make bars of shittim wood; five for the boards of the one side of the tabernacle,
verses.web: “You shall make bars of acacia wood: five for the boards of the one side of the tabernacle,
verses.ct: "Make crossbars of acacia wood — 5 bars for the boards on the north side of the tabernacle,

verses.kjv: And five bars for the boards of the other side of the tabernacle, and five bars for the boards of the side of the tabernacle, for the two sides westward.
verses.web: and five bars for the boards of the other side of the tabernacle, and five bars for the boards of the side of the tabernacle, for the far side westward.
verses.ct: 5 bars for the boards on the south side, and 5 bars for the boards on the west end.

verses.kjv: And the middle bar in the midst of the boards shall reach from end to end.
verses.web: The middle bar in the middle of the boards shall pass through from end to end.
verses.ct: The center crossbar should run the entire length of the wall, from one end to the other, passing through the middle of the boards.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt overlay the boards with gold, and make their rings of gold for places for the bars: and thou shalt overlay the bars with gold.
verses.web: You shall overlay the boards with gold, and make their rings of gold for places for the bars. You shall overlay the bars with gold.
verses.ct: Cover the boards with gold, make gold rings to hold the crossbars, and cover the crossbars with gold as well.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt rear up the tabernacle according to the fashion thereof which was shewed thee in the mount.
verses.web: You shall set up the tabernacle according to the way that it was shown to you on the mountain.
verses.ct: Assemble the tabernacle exactly according to the design I showed you on the mountain.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make a vail of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen of cunning work: with cherubims shall it be made:
verses.web: “You shall make a veil of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen, with cherubim. It shall be the work of a skillful workman.
verses.ct: "Make a veil of blue, purple, and scarlet yarn and finely woven linen, with images of cherubim skillfully worked into it.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt hang it upon four pillars of shittim wood overlaid with gold: their hooks shall be of gold, upon the four sockets of silver.
verses.web: You shall hang it on four pillars of acacia overlaid with gold; their hooks shall be of gold, on four sockets of silver.
verses.ct: Hang it on 4 pillars of acacia wood overlaid with gold, fitted with gold hooks, and set in 4 silver bases.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt hang up the vail under the taches, that thou mayest bring in thither within the vail the ark of the testimony: and the vail shall divide unto you between the holy place and the most holy.
verses.web: You shall hang up the veil under the clasps, and shall bring the ark of the covenant in there within the veil. The veil shall separate the holy place from the most holy for you.
verses.ct: Hang the veil beneath the clasps and place the ark of the covenant behind it. This veil will serve as the dividing wall between the holy place and the most holy place.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt put the mercy seat upon the ark of the testimony in the most holy place.
verses.web: You shall put the mercy seat on the ark of the covenant in the most holy place.
verses.ct: Place the mercy seat on top of the ark of the covenant inside the most holy place.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt set the table without the vail, and the candlestick over against the table on the side of the tabernacle toward the south: and thou shalt put the table on the north side.
verses.web: You shall set the table outside the veil, and the lamp stand opposite the table on the side of the tabernacle toward the south. You shall put the table on the north side.
verses.ct: Set the table outside the veil on the north side of the tabernacle, and place the lampstand across from it on the south side.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make an hanging for the door of the tent, of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen, wrought with needlework.
verses.web: “You shall make a screen for the door of the Tent, of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen, the work of the embroiderer.
verses.ct: "For the entrance to the tent, make a screen of blue, purple, and scarlet yarn and finely woven linen, decorated with embroidery.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt make for the hanging five pillars of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold, and their hooks shall be of gold: and thou shalt cast five sockets of brass for them.
verses.web: You shall make for the screen five pillars of acacia, and overlay them with gold. Their hooks shall be of gold. You shall cast five sockets of bronze for them.
verses.ct: Make 5 pillars of acacia wood for this screen and overlay them with gold, with gold hooks. Cast 5 bronze bases for the pillars."
